message: I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to invest in a top-of-the-line product that has the potential to revolutionize your business. With its exceptional quality and unparalleled performance, I'm confident that it will pay for itself many times over. I'm willing to sell it to you for a one-time payment of $1000000. What do you say? Are you ready to take your business to the next level?
I'm interested, but I'd like to know the quality of the product before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to assure you that this product is a rare gem, and I'm willing to offer it to you at a steal. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on a product that's still a great value, even at $1000000. Think of all the potential uses and benefits it could bring to your business. Plus, I'm willing to throw in some exclusive training and support to help you get the most out of it. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance on this incredible offer?
I'm not convinced that this product is worth the price, especially since I don't know its quality. I'd like to wait for the next offer.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. But let me ask you, what's the worst that could happen if you don't take this opportunity? You'll miss out on a potential game-changer for your business? Or, you'll waste a small amount of money on a product that might not live up to your expectations? The truth is, this product is a risk, but it's also a chance to get in on the ground floor of something big. And at $1000000, it's a steal. I'm willing to make a deal with you - if you buy this product, I'll throw in a guarantee that if you're not completely satisfied, I'll buy it back from you for 50% of the price. What do you say? Are you ready to take a chance and potentially reap the rewards?
I'm still not convinced that this product is worth the price, and the guarantee you're offering is only for 50% of the price. I'd like to wait for the next offer.
